Package com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LwjglApplet
    An OpenGL surface in an applet.
    LwjglApplication
    An OpenGL surface fullscreen or in a lightweight window.
    LwjglApplicationConfiguration  
    LwjglApplicationConfiguration.LwjglApplicationConfigurationDisplayMode  
    LwjglAWTCanvas
    An OpenGL surface on an AWT Canvas, allowing OpenGL to be embedded in a Swing application.
    LwjglAWTInput  
    LwjglCanvas
    An OpenGL surface on an AWT Canvas, allowing OpenGL to be embedded in a Swing application.
    LwjglFileHandle  
    LwjglFiles  
    LwjglFrame
    Wraps an LwjglCanvas in a resizable JFrame.
    LwjglGLU  
    LwjglGraphics
    An implementation of the Graphics interface based on Lwjgl.
    LwjglPreferences
